rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with a Scandinavian minimalist design featuring light wood finishes and neutral tones. Vastu principles ensure proper entry orientation.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An expansive area with multi-functional furniture to serve as both living room and dining space, incorporating elements like a coffee table and built-in storage. Natural light is maximized through large windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen with Scandinavian design accents, featuring energy-efficient appliances and ample countertop space for food preparation. The layout follows Vastu guidelines to promote positivity and balance.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact yet functional bathroom designed with clean lines and Nordic aesthetics. Essential fixtures are arranged according to local building norms for safety and accessibility.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Small living space for the household staff including a bed area, small kitchenette, and storage. Designed to be separate from main living quarters while maintaining Scandinavian simplicity.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A large door positioned at the north-eastern side for auspicious entry following Vastu principles.

details.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Provides access to the small outdoor terrace for relaxation.
